page.title: 03JOBS IN OUR AREA
page.content: We carried out a census of all the parents of{Horrabridge Junior School children and found that their jobs fell into several categories{.Office {work & social services}were common activities,others like{mining}or {industrial work}were not so common.We also found that men did a wider variety of jobs than women ,who worked in 3 main areas,in services,as {housewives & as office workers}.The men were found to work in the additional areas of{mining}and the {Armed Forces}.Very few people in this area were found to be{unemployed.}This accounts for the Junior children's parents only,we estimate approximately 50% of the adults in the village , a wider study would no doubt highlight the large number of{retired}people living in the area.
